bwwExcerpt: Here, two robot characters, for goodness sake, are carrying on that age-old Broadway declaration that love, and only love, is the existential necessity we cannot live without. Only here itâ€™s manifested in ways that even Stephen Sondheim could not have dreamed.
showScoreExcerpt: "Maybe Happy Ending dazzles with its love story and astounds with its visual accomplishments. There's nothing robotic about this production: it wears its heart on its sleeve and on charm alone, succeeds."
